alert.note: Alert for Leflore; Sunflower; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:22AM CDT until June 15 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN SUNFLOWER...SOUTHWESTERN LEFLORE...EAST CENTRAL WASHINGTON AND HUMPHREYS COUNTIES... At 222 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Murphy, or 9 miles east of Hollandale, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Isola around 230 AM CDT. Belzoni and Silver City around 240 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
